column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hama says : " The guards were always very careful to keep any water away from us .
#Text=My cell unlocked by the very guards assigned to keep me in .
#Text=Once you perfect this technique , you can control anything or anyone .
#Text=" Katara says : " But ... to reach inside someone and control them ?
#Text=I do n't know if I want that kind of power .
#Text=" Hama says : " The choice is not yours .
#Text=The power exists .
#Text=And it 's your duty to use the gifts you 've been given to win this war .
#Text=Katara , they tried to wipe us out , our entire culture , your mother !
#Text=" Katara says : " I know .
#Text=" Hama says : " Then you should understand what I 'm talking about !
#Text=We 're the last two waterbenders of the Southern Tribe .
#Text=We have to fight these people whenever we can , wherever they are , with any means necessary !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's you ... You 're the one who 's been making people disappear during the full moons !
#Text=" Hama says : " They threw me in prison to rot , along with my brothers and sisters !
#Text=They deserve the same !
#Text=You must carry on my work !
#Text=" Katara says : " I wo n't !
#Text=I wo n't use bloodbending and I wo n't allow you to keep terrorizing this town !
#Text=" Hama says : " You should 've learned the technique before you turned against me !
#Text=It 's impossible to fight your way out of my grip !
#Text=I control every muscle , every vein in your body !
#Text=" Katara says : " Stop !
#Text=Please ... " Katara says : " You 're not the only one who draws power from the moon !
#Text=My bending is more powerful than yours , Hama .
#Text=Your technique is useless on me !
#Text=" Hama says : " Aahhh !
#Text="
